5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abdullah relates on the authority of his father. He who missed his afternoon prayer it is as though he was deprived of his family and property

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّغْلِيظِ فِي تَفْوِيتِ صَلاَةِ الْعَصْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Stern warning against missing the `Asr prayer
